files-organizer.title: Files Organizer
files-organizer.description: An App that checks and manages the Downloads folder in a windows computer. It can stay running on the background.
introduction: This is the first desktop application that I made. I started doing it with a friend so we learned to work together with Git and Github.
Checks and manages the Downloads folder in a windows computer, it can stay running on the background and deploys a system tray icon.

The methodology is simple, the program reads the extensions from the files in the current folder (Downloads Folder by default) and groups them depending on their types to move them to their correspondent folders.

p: This project introduce me on User Interfaces, but in the meantime it also taught me some other things:

adomi.title: ADOMI
adomi.description: Analysis of Data Obtained by a Measurement Instrument.
introduction: This is a small project named ADOMI (Analysis of Data Obtained by a Measurement Instrument). It was made for a python course where I participated in November 2020. It was developed managing libraries like pandas, scipy, matplotlib, etc.
The algorithm reads a .xlsx file and returns a graph with some extra analysis.

p: This is a final project for a course at ITBA (Buenos Aires National Institute) . With this project I learned a lot about functional programming, Python and Data Analysis. I improved my code, making it more clean and understandable.

calculatorha.title: Calculator HA
calculatorha.description: Online calculator specialized in concrete structures.
introduction: Some calculations in high school were very repetitive so I decided to create this little calculator that makes the pre-dimensioning of concrete structures much faster.
The program calculates the final dimensions from the input data and keeps a history of the past calculus on the right side of the page.
